resources.string: "I am Intelligent computer engineer, java programmer and android developer with extensive training and experience in android app development and database management. I am a Passionate professional looking to leverage technical skills, experience and knowledge as a software/android developer. "

I am experienced in using Java as well as kotlin for android application development. I have spent my free time learning Flutter over the last few months which I believe would be a useful tool to help the company develop cross platform mobile applications. With my skills, I can help the company build scalable,very efficient and effective mobile application.
